headline: I recently joined learn direct to do a‚Ä¶
reviewBody: I recently joined learn direct to do a midwifery course however during my time studying there is no support to help you throughout the course. They give you these course materials for you to read and expect you to understand right away. There are no online tutor classes like some other online learning platforms. When you do not understand your assignment and write an email to your tutor they take days to a week to even give you a reply and when they do reply they not explain in detail. I am a visual learning I learn by watching and just reading. It won't let me pass this course. I NEED MORE SUPPORT! And please upgrade the platform and introduce some online tutor learning classes. A bit disappointed. However the customer service is great that's the only good thing

headline: Awful company
reviewBody: Awful company when wanting to cancel they mess you about so you‚Äôre out of the 14 days and have to pay it all anyway. They don‚Äôt respond to emails or help tickets in a timely fashion, they‚Äôll then chase you for debts when you can‚Äôt get to the phone because they‚Äôre only open when you‚Äôre at work.  Customer Service on the phone is okay when they want to chase you for debts.

headline: Harassment and reported to police. AVOID
reviewBody:
I cancelled the course within the correct timeframe, upon realising they were taking money out of my account still,  i told my bank to not give them anymore. A year went by and that was the end of it. Well they've a year later starting hounding me for money. Texting, emailing and phoning. Without knowing who answers the phone they start talking about me which im pretty sure breeches data protection. They have tried to trick my partner into getting me on the phone by pretending to be my sons school tutor! After hounding me several times and threatening text  messages and emails ive completely had enough and we are going to ask the police for advice

Edit: now sending a cease and desist letter. Will update  accordingly. And regarding learn directs reply, they send that bot message to everyone and they've requested no information from me. What a joke

headline: DO NOT PUT YOUR MONEY TO WASTE! It‚Äôs not WORTH IT‚ùåüö´
reviewBody:
BE AWARE‚ùå‚ÄºÔ∏è

If I could rate Learndirect -0, I would have. I studied access Course to Nursing with Learndirect which I ended up cancelling. I still get charged ¬£153.86 for a course I haven‚Äôt studied for almost 3 months. It‚Äôs a RIP OFF if you ask me. The tutor is extremely unhelpful and straight off rude. I would get ungraded for every assignment and would get marked on my last attempt to submit. The course is expensive & you don‚Äôt get the right support from tutors. If you‚Äôre planning to study with the Learndirect. I would advice you THINK TWICE. I am not hearing to speak bad about Learndirect however, Just to mention my terrible experience while studying with them. Worse of All, if you cancel the course after the 14day enrolment, you will be charged the same amount per month which I think is ABSURD & INSANE!
I have been charged  almost ¬£700 which I DEMAND REFUND! I changed the course and I still get charged for the ORIGINAL AMOUNT! I have a debt of ¬£460 to PAY NOW! Which I will get a lawyer to discuss with Learndirect because I will not be paying this amount at ALL!

headline: Access to higher education(nursing)
reviewBody:
Still currently studying access to higher education(nursing) but feel so unsupported. The units take sometimes up to a week to be marked, then you get them back with little to no help and when you ask questions it takes 3-4 days to recieve feedback so you can make changes. By this time, you've missed your deadline which all reflects on your qualification for university. I wouldn't recommend studying with learn direct due to the lack of support given from the tutors, who just seem to respond with "read unit 3 - academic writing." Considering I pay ¬£175 a month, you'd think you would have a tutor who would be reliable and give detailed advice. After speaking to customer services, I was essentially told to get on with it. 
Definitely look elsewhere to study this course as you don't get the extra push to help you succeed with learn direct, just your confidence kicked down and threats of losing your place on the course you pay for.

headline: Learning Direct does not reimburse you!
reviewBody: I have received a confirmation from Learning Direct that my course  cancellation went through on 31st March 2021. On 5th May 2021, I called to say that the money was still not back on my account, they promised to sort it out. On 6th June still no money on my account. Is that a good company? I doubt it!

headline: Wouldn‚Äôt bother
reviewBody: Initial customer service is good but, the tutor feedback is amongst the worst I‚Äôve had. I got feedback that stated I‚Äôd hit the assignment criteria but because I‚Äôd gone over the word count, I had to re submit! Surely the aim of the course is to showcase your understanding and competency? Really disheartening to receive feedback like that given how hard I‚Äôd worked and with no context as to why the word count is important in relation to each question. Also had really blunt and unhelpful responses to questions I‚Äôve sent to tutors. Really disappointed and wouldn‚Äôt waste your money if you‚Äôre someone who is diligent in your approach to writing.

headline: I have been studying at Stonebridge‚Ä¶
reviewBody: I have been studying at Stonebridge college through learn direct since 2019 I am studying to be a foot health practitioner. Due to COVID the course has taken a lot longer than originally planned of course I understand the college or learn direct has no control over this, this is a difficult time for everyone business‚Äôs & learning facilities however both learn direct have been completely useless when updating me with any information regarding my practical part of the course. Every student is suppose to have an online tutor you can speak at any one time this option has never been available I have rang both the college and learn direct several times as-well as emailed and even sent a letter to to the Birmingham learning Centre I have had next to no replies other than once last year giving me a new date for the practical part of the course and then to cancel that again due to COVID. This was back in January and since we have come out of lock down I have made several attempts to contact them just to gage an idea of what the next step is I have paid a substantial amount of money and worked really hard on the theory part of it he course so I am extremely disappointed with the service & support from both Stonebridge college and learn direct. I would never take on another course with either company I would warn anyone to be really careful where they start there learning journeys.

reviewBody: Absolutely awful. The support is abysmal. I was unable to complete much of the course due to illness. They only time they ever cared was when payment was missed. Their staff in payments are cold, uncaring and just a little sadistic. STAY AWAY

headline: The WORST COMPANY EVER avoid avoid and‚Ä¶
reviewBody: The WORST COMPANY EVER avoid avoid and avoid if you don t want to be ripped off like we ve been. Tried to raise a complaint nobody even takes notice of you. Called them 10 times every time same answer ,, someone will give you a call and we will try to help‚Äù. I paid in full for all my training 1100¬£ and guess what no training for 1 year and half. headline: AVOID AVOID AVOID
reviewBody: I have SO much to say about this company. But my first advice would be AVOID. Today I enrolled on a course, selected monthly payments and was enticed by the pay ¬£9.99 now and nothing until July. Imagine my horror when I realised they had taken the full amount of the course...¬£319 from my bank. I rang them within 5 minutes to ask for an immediate refund and was told it would take 30 days!! My bank is now in overdraft and I have no money to buy food and my stress levels are through the roof. It‚Äôs absolutely disgusting. Have phone back and demanded I speak to someone in management but was told they will send me a form to fill in then I should get my money back within 7 days!!! I am going to take this to the media and make sure people know not to touch this company ...they have no morals!

headline: Issue after issue with Learndirect
reviewBody:
I‚Äôve been having issues with Learndirect throughout my course, Lack of support, Not resolving issues, being passed back and forth just to delay any sort of resolution, now I‚Äôm not getting anywhere as they cannot resolve the issues, they‚Äôve taking the issues on board to assist others in the future as clear errors made but cannot help me! I would therefore  not recommend this provider.
Please ensure you read the small print as I am now unable to go to uni despite paying for and trying to complete the access to higher university course, all due to marking timeframes and when Learndirect have their marking assessment boards.

Thanks for reading and good luck if you choose to use Learndirect !


 I have another post on here for those wanting to know more about my experiences.

headline: Straight forward process...
reviewBody: After enquiring and deciding to enrol on one of the learn direct courses, I had a phone call from Kirsty Harris, she couldn‚Äôt have been more helpful. Having not done anything like this before and deciding to take the plunge, Kirsty talked me through the process step by step, she was very chatty on the phone and really helpful. She even emailed me to let me know what to expect and whom I would be hearing from regarding starting the course. The whole process was really straight forward and I'm now looking forward to progressing with my course! Definitely recommend. Thank you Kirsty!

headline: I have been dealing with someone called‚Ä¶

headline: Won't let you cancel !
reviewBody:
Opted to do a CBT course and pay monthly. However, changed my mind within 14 days and having not accessed any course material let alone been assigned a tutor or submitted any work. Since this I am being hounded with threats saying they can track my usage of the materials and that will be enough to take me to court ! Sincerely regret having anything to do with this company. Would not recommend to anyone !

Can't identify me from my name - you email me constantly threatening me and the email address contains my name !! Tried to say my review was unverified because they don't like what I'm saying. Showed trust pilot the proof of my awful experience with learn direct and they have verified this review now. Awful, underhand company. I would actually be questioning the authenticity of the positive reviews

Further update 

Still being hounded and apparently even though I cancelled, the tutors and markers have all been paid. Therefore, I have to pay them, even though I completed no course work and wasn't allocated a tutor. In summary I have to pay for a course that I cancelled and had no access to and absolutely no work was completed on. I sincerely regret having anything to do with this unethical company. I'm sure they're fine as long as they are getting their money but God forbid you cancel !!!

headline: Easy Cancellation? - Forget it!
reviewBody: The company make it so easy to process a cancellation. I requested one on the 10 April 2021 and was due my refund on the 12 May 2021 after being approved. However, the company have STILL NOT refunded me and I keep having to chase them up everyday. Despite being told I will get call-backs, no one calls me up, returns my calls or updates me on the refund. My payment is now nearly a week late (on Monday). I am a carer for my sister and despite explaining my situation, LearnDirect are continuing to ponder on finding out why I have not yet been refunded. The staff all say different things, there is no clue amongst them on how the refund process works and despite saying they will be in contact with me ASAP, they are not and the communication with each other is worse than with their customers. DO NOT join LearnDirect and if you want to cancel, do not assume it is an easy process. As I write this review, I am waiting for a call - oh yes, I doubt i'll get one with their past record! I wanted to do another course with Learn Direct but NO WAY! - NEVER AGAIN! avoid at all costs!!!!

Michelle

headline: Worst company I've ever used
reviewBody: Worst company I've ever used. They do not care about your learning, they never respond to your messages and the people on thier phone lines are rude and sarcastic. After having trouble with them for weeks, I found out they had added on 400 pound to my account for an exam, yes one exam. I tried to stop payment for this and because of that they've blocked access to BOTH my courses even though the other is PAID UP TO DATE. They don't respond to queries you have or help you in anyway but they quickly add on money where they want and block your account. Also tutor response is so slow and materials are useless. I am on many nursing pages on social media and so many people have the same issues. DO NOT use this company, go elsewhere there's many other places who do the same courses for cheaper and treat you much better.

headline: Paid deposit for course with  monthly‚Ä¶
reviewBody:
QPaid deposit for course with  monthly installments or so I thought.emptied my bank account.
Three days later and despite being assured of return my account remains 
empty.no response.spoke to an advisor on phone who laughed when I said I'd no money since Friday when my bank account had been emptied by this organisation.its now been six days.
8 days now without refund.i am absolutely appalled and shocked by the way I have been treated.no one is actually dealing with it just pass the buck.im now wishing to cancel course  that sickened off.
Refund received in full after nearly two weeks.My course was instantly withdrawn This time failed to hold the actual deposit were meant to take in first place so now after all the distress and constant chasing I do not have my place on course.i have requested numerous times for bank details to enable me to pay deposit and set up.standing order for monthly payments.
Ignored.
They seriously expect me to pay over phone again assuring won't empty account this time.Oddly I don't feel comfortable with that as the advisor that took the payment initially read back to me 49 pounds had been taken at time of transaction which was clearly a lie.

headline: I intially did write a review over a‚Ä¶
reviewBody:
I intially did write a review over a month ago which was 5 starts but I now had to delete my original review as it wouldn't let me edit it. 

My recent experience has been terrible with them. Although it was all good when I first contacted them, one of their team member, Harry Forrestal, explained to me the whole process in detail but when I realised that it was going to cost too much, I told him I didn't want to go ahead. But he convinced me to book the course for now as he claimed they had one last space for a deal to get it cheaper which I now think is complete rubbish and that I could delete it anytime and I would be refunded with my deposit.

What he failed to mention was that it would take them a month to refund it. Believing him I did book it but then cancelled it the next day and I was assured I would get my deposit back.

Its now a month and 11 days and I still haven't recieved it. I've rung them about 4-5 times and each time they'll say I w,ill be deffinitely getting it and that it has been processed but I still dont see it in my account. I dont understand as to why it takes them so long just to return ¬£29.99. 

I feel like I was tricked into putting down the deposit and if I didn't contact them and pressure them about it, they would have just left it. Really bad Learn direct, you need to do better and not fool honest people.

headline: Course confusion initially, resolved quickly and effectively.
reviewBody:
EDIT - someone from customer services quickly contacted me and have now apologised for the confusion. This was all sorted within an hour. They have now made clear how the course works and have assured me this mix up won‚Äôt happen again. James was extremely helpful and has assured me that I will be able to complete the course fully and that time constraints are not an issue. I am happy to continue with the course and am confident this will not happen again to future people, I guess everyone has to learn from mistakes. I would recommend you give the course a go and if you have issues contact James and his team. 

I have kept it at 4 starts due to the initial mix up but like I said, hopefully all good from now on. 

I signed up for the teaching assistant diploma course and was assured covid wouldn‚Äôt affect things. I was told I can do ALL the theory side of things and do the practical placement in a school at the end of the course. Turns out this was a complete lie. I‚Äôve got to assignment 4 and cannot continue with the course without a placement. I spoke to my tutor about this and when she realised I wasn‚Äôt being stupid and was genuinely  confused due to conflicting information she was helpful in explaining how the course actually works. I‚Äôve tried to get a placement now schools are open again but government guidelines dictate they still cannot accept me and don‚Äôt know when they will be able to. I called customer services who advised me to continue with the theory side of the course (again) so I had to explain to them how the course actually works. They said they would pass this onto someone higher up, but just passed it onto my tutor which wasn‚Äôt helpful as she‚Äôs done what she can to help. I‚Äôve now just been told to read through the information on the course by my tutor which is a pointless exercise as I can‚Äôt use the information I‚Äôve read and will just have to read through it all again when I can actually progress with the course. I‚Äôve spent hundreds of pounds on a course that I can‚Äôt complete and feel like I was mislead simply to get me to sign up and hand money over. Customer services are less than helpful and clearly don‚Äôt know what they‚Äôre talking about. My tutor has been helpful but there‚Äôs only so much she can do as she‚Äôs only really there to mark my assignments. I‚Äôve been told not to worry about the time limit but I bet they‚Äôll be quick to ask for more money when I reach it. Don‚Äôt trust anything they say, they don‚Äôt know what they‚Äôre talking about. Extremely frustrated and upset that I‚Äôve parted with so much money for potentially nothing. 

If you‚Äôre thinking about signing up, at least wait until the pandemic ends because it may affect your course, even though they‚Äôll tell you it won‚Äôt. 

The second star is only because my tutor has actually tried to offer advice.

headline: Was very easy to sign up
reviewBody: Was very easy to sign up , and pay for in installments. I think the course is easily accessible and seems to be very supportive (although I am only a week into it). The only thing I was unsure of , is it says you can do at your own pace but then gives deadlines for units. This isn't a problem for me , as it will give me focus, but think this needs to be noted, because it isn't fully at your own pace with deadlines in place. However the deadlines seem to be very reasonable for the work required. Very happy overall, and staff were friendly and efficient, and appeared to be very knowledgeable.

headline: Poor con artist!
reviewBody:
Poor con artist!! 
I've just read another review thats the exact same they've done to me!! 
Signed up a year ago.. wasn't ready so cancelled within the 14days that there terms state! 
A YEAR later I'm getting harassing emails from a guy called kieran every single day saying I owe money!! Ive had no letters, no emails nothing until a year later this kieran is emailing saying I owe money! I've responded to every email and every email of mine has been ignored but yet he still emails me every single day. I have now reported this Kieran Phelps and the company via the ombudsman form as its disgusting!! I don't want a reply to say to email further details to customer service as ive already been emailing months and got completely ignored so its now all been reported today and Kierans harassing daily emails have also been reported. 
Cancelled a year ago and now beg for money a year later. Do not use this company!

headline: I applied for a course to be given‚Ä¶
reviewBody: I applied for a course to be given misleading information,the customer service manager agreed this was false information I had received meaning the course was far from any good for my self,i was told that was it cancelled and I had to answer the phone the next day for it to be fully cancelled I done this,I then called phoned 3 times for my deposit to be refunded I was then told 30 days,then when I called after the 30 days was told a few more days,now today I have been told iv not signed a form,I made the company well aware as a already student and 4 children I didn‚Äôt have money to throw away and it seems THATS what I would have been better doing,I‚Äôm not going to let this go but I‚Äôm highlighting the problems you have with this company.

headline: Thank you Learn Direct
reviewBody: I had an issue with Learn Direct concerning a cancellation of a course I changed my mind about. There was some sort of misunderstanding about my desire to cancel the course and I was baffled and unsure of what was going on. However, after I left somewhat negative feedback here I received a phone call from James at Learn Direct - he could not have been more appologetic and bent over backwards to fix the issue. I was compensated in a wonderful way and am completely satisfied with the outcome. I am now looking forward to doing more courses with them. I find the online learning and user interface very easy to use and is good materials in the courses. Thank you James and thank you Learn Direct!!

headline: Laura was lovely
reviewBody:
Laura was lovely when I called first, she answered all the questions I asked.
I called her back to make the payment when I had decided, had to leave a voicemail but she called me back within half an hour.
Had a call a few days later from a man asking how I was, if I had received login details and had a look round the website. He was very nice, and asked if he could call me back again in a week to check that I was getting on OK with everything. It has only been 3 days since he called, so I haven't received his next call as of yet.
Very impressed with the service so far.

headline: Study with another company.
reviewBody:
There are so many inconsistencies with what is asked of you with LearnDirect. I am currently currently studying an Access to HE Diploma in Midwifery and it has definitely not been enjoyable. 
1. There are 21 units to complete, each marked by a different tutor each time so they have no idea who you are or your capabilities. Some tutors give decent feedback and recommendations whilst others not so much... i submitted a formal complaint about how one spoke to me via email as it was appalling. 
2. I am on unit 13 and only now am I being told not to use a certain website to extract information from as they are 'an unreliable source', yet i have used it before and never had this mentioned.
3. I have been asked on several occasions to provide an essay for no more than 2,000 words, yet there will be 5 or 6 questions that need to be answered in 'detail'. To fit the word count is impossible with what they ask. 
4. I question if the tutors really read submissions fully at times, as I have been advised to discuss certain topics even though I have done that...
5. In feedback I have been penalised for not reading and taking information from NHS websites, even though it was never stated that it was a requirement for me to fulfil the question and obtain a Distinction Grade....I am not a mind reader. 

Overall I would not recommend Learn Direct as a means to somebody undertaking an Access Course. It is a lot of money to invest in a programme which is unreliable and full of inconsistencies.

headline: Final certificate...
reviewBody:
I recently finished the course and had been waiting (and waiting) for my result, which had somehow gone straight into my spam folder.
I passed the course but needed my certificate but as I was paying in installments this will not come until I had paid my final balance (which is more than fair).
I spoke to a brilliant, helpful and very professional member of the team by the name of Harley, who went well above and beyond her duty to help me out.
Many thanks :-)

reviewBody:
was recommended this company by my friends, enrolment was so easy and was very excited, but since then I've had nothing but problems.
1- they couldn't take my money out on the correct date, leaving me in my overdraft MULTIPUL times, despite numerous phone calls/email this was on going issue for me(even after they charged me ¬£100)
2- emails were ignored on multiple occasions.
3- again, i was charged ¬£100, but no body seems to know why??
4- complaints procedure is near enough impossible
5- my exams are in 5 weeks, however, I do not know when or where I'm supposed to be sitting them as communication is so poor.

*I would not recommend this company if you actually want to achieve anything, I spend my days off chasing up things rather than actually studying.

headline: Kirsty Harris is my contact at‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Kirsty Harris is my contact at learndirect. she has been very helpful and mate the enrolment process very smooth. Great professional service.

headline: Spoke to a lovely lady named Megan she‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Spoke to a lovely lady named Megan she was very helpful and didn't pressure me to enrol and gave me time to think about the costs super helpful can't thank her enough now I have enrolled

headline: The woman from learn direct who I‚Ä¶
reviewBody: The woman from learn direct who I talked to about my options and the AHE nursing diploma was brilliant, very understanding, she replied to my emails almost straight away nearly every time and fully understood my preference for emails rather than phone calls making the whole experience much less daunting for me and very straight forward to get sorted. I would definitely feel comfortable to contact her again with any queries and would definitely recommend the service to anyone looking to extend or update their education.

headline: Not worth the money
reviewBody:
I am changing my review as within a few days of starting my course I searched for where this is accredited (as it claims to be) I couldn't find anything so contacted Learn Direct. I informed them I was querying the accreditation and would want to cancel if not properly accredited. 

They never got back to me and so yesterday I finally got tired of waiting and called up, only to be told there is absolutely no trace of the message I sent them. They are now refusing to cancel as it's outside of their 14 day policy despite me initially contacting them within the same week. I find it oddly convenient for them that my message vanished. What a rip off!

headline: Material is very brief and basic
reviewBody: Material is very brief and basic. I understand that like in any course you are expected to do further research of your own to expand on what is provided, but when what they provide is a single sentence or little more on the majority of the topics discussed it quickly becomes very frustrating. I also found the material contradictory and in some case's incorrect, and of little use to me. Learn direct seems more concerned with emailing me to leave a review than actually teaching anything. I'm not sure they will be so keen to push for a review after this. Very dissatisfied customer.

The course work they supply is basically a few bits of paper with info copy and pasted of the internet. If you want more help then this comes at an extra cost to yourself. headline: I was initially happy with the service‚Ä¶
reviewBody: I was initially happy with the service when I enrolled and received a follow up phone call an e-mail. Since then the customer service has not been as good. I have sent a few e-mails concerning the marking criteria, because it has been years since I have written essays. I was told to send my first module and then I can see how it is marked. I sent my first module over 4 weeks ago and it has still not been marked. I sent an e-mail asking how long it usually takes and was told it would be looked into. Unfortunately, I have still not received a reply. When I signed up I did not expect such long delays in replying and marking,

headline: Very professional
reviewBody:
I received a call today from Charlie and he sounded very professional indeed! He definitely knew his role and his customer service skills were excellent! He informed me with regards to what happens on the course and with the assessment criteria.

He was very speedy in his approach in relation to payment and also gave me a discount for enrolling today! I really appreciated that!

I spoke with him again on the chat link via the Learn Direct site and he answered my question. He also told me how to contact my tutor and gave me a telephone number to call.

Another thing I would like to add is that this is my first time studying with Learn Direct and happy that they followed what they said online with regards to the payment plan. From my previous experience with another company was a different story and totally opposite with what they stated online. 

I very much appreciate this kind of service!

This course is very affordable and cheap! I like that I can pay as little as ¬£32 a month and study at my own pace. 

Thank you Learn Direct! :)

headline: Great patience and communication
reviewBody:
I have to say the guy I dealt with, Maz, was not pushy, very informative and patient. I did loads of looking on the internet for days. I also kept going back to Maz several times to ask questions, and he answered all and was very helpful. 
I finally made a decision and the process was so simple and easy, I was set up within about 3 minutes. 
So I have given 5 stars due to, no hard sell, Maz‚Äôs patience and knowledge, and so easy set up.
Looking forward to starting my course, hope it‚Äôs as good an experience as this has been.

headline: Complete scam
reviewBody:
Complete scam. Tried to cancel the course had no response to emails and letters.  The mock exams are free off of google and the coursework is useless. 
One tutor lesson that spent the whole time telling me I need to study more and didn‚Äôt reply to any of my emails. Not once did they ask how I was finding the course. 
I had one tutor lesson and a mock exam free off google and they are still expecting me to pay ¬£1200. 
Worst company ever! 
Ofsted says these are a inadequate provider so be careful guys and do research before.
They also keep harassing me by emails and texts!

headline: Amazing guidance, help and hears to a new future
reviewBody:
Wow, What an experience. I am completely changing {later on in age} my life's direction.
Rianna P was amazing, helpful, and eager to start my new journey.  She guided me through everything from how to gain the qualification to the part after it. I was never pushed into anything and she gave me time to talk things over with my husband.
I cannot recommend Rhianna more.
Such a Lovely person to guide you, when you have no clue and are starting again. 
I am so eager and ready to get going.
Communication was sent to my email whilst on the phone and I was talked through everything.
She had nothing but time for me and my silly questions. 
Thank you Rhianna, and thank you Learn direct for having these courses, and totally changing my families, and my life.

headline: Amazing Customer Service
reviewBody:
Been looking at enrolling on two courses for the past few weeks, after speaking to Simon on the phone he answered all queries and also provided me with information that I didn't even think to ask. It was a quick set up, very efficient and easy, Simon made me feel at ease and applied the additional 5% that you can not get through applying on the website, which was very welcoming.

I was very surprised to also received a voicemail this morning just to check that I had received my login details and to make sure I had everything I needed. 

So far amazing customer service and no regrets.

headline: An easy, effective and well priced way to study online.
reviewBody:
I chose Learndirect to update and gain some basic qualifications so I can start by own business. The first course I chose I found to be easy to access. A really well planned and executed learning tutorial and very informative. It has allowed me to study in my own time and complete all the necessary parts to attain my qualification. I also received a reduced fee and a further percentage off if I wished to study further. 
I will definitely be studying more with learndirect and would recommend them to people looking for an easy, effective and well priced way to study online.

headline: Super impressed!
reviewBody:
Received a call from Learndirect, who were just checking that I had received my online course through and was able to access it without issue.  This was a refreshing approach.  As it stood, I had and I had already started studying.
I explained that I had just pulled into the superstore carpark.  I received an apology for the inconvenience and was asked if I'd prefer an email to guide me through contacting a tutor should I require, rather than the customer service rep taking me through it.  Which apparently is what usually happens on the call.  Again, a refreshing approach.  A common sense approach, helpful in the extreme and as good as their word, said email swiftly appeared.  Can't rate Learndirect highly enough at this moment in time.  Super impressed!

headline: Learn Direct cancellation refund
reviewBody: Learn Direct were efficient in cancelling my course. However I have not received my money back  . I have e mailed several times and been told to wait 30 days. Now at 30 days I‚Äôve been told to expect the refund next week. So the terms and conditions are not adhered to. Why ? Do not expect to get refunded easily. Beware .

headline: OMG!...
reviewBody: OMG!.... please avoid at all costs!... I applied for the access course and paid the ¬£9.99 fee and then first month ¬£188.00 for 12 months. I , unfortunately became v ill ü§í and was unable to afford the monthly payments..... I must add I always pay my way but could not afford the monthly repayments at that time. I phoned Learn direct and told them my situation, and asked if I could have a payment break for 2 months.... I wasn‚Äôt getting anywhere with the staff so they sent me through to this other guy. I explained my situation, and at this time I was in hospital... he basically said he was JUST under the CEO of the learn direct Company and it was basically MY problem not his!!!!!..... unbelievable..... I am now, every single day being chased by debt collectors threatening me!.... ( I can prove this)..... it has played havoc on my mental health and I am v anxious. The total bill is over ¬£1700!.... plus fees and atm I am seeking legal advice. Please, avoid this company!.....btw, If you leave realistic comments they don‚Äôt like on their social media posts..... they are deleted!!!!!..... they are ripping off people and you can‚Äôt even warn others! forgot to add.... I had only been registered for the course for less than a month!!!!!üòû

Had my initial doubts about learning such a large career  changing subject & being accepted for the finance.
For someone like me that's in poverty to move forward & better myself, mentally, emotionally & with physical well being was crucial.
With in 24 hours of registration after checking my junk  folder I was so delighted & my fears lifted.
Looking so forward to progressing.
You should do the same.

headline: I registered on this course to do the‚Ä¶
reviewBody:
I registered on this course to do the foot health practitioners course. Very little support struggle to get any reply‚Äôs. I paid for advance 2 weeks practical to be told it was to be cut down to 5 days. Practical got cancel twice and had to train with another college. Yes they offered the course that Stonebridge couldn‚Äôt deliver even though I had paid for it. 
Told me it was due to covid but advertising for lecturers. Shocking treatment and there is myself and 6 other people looking to get refunds. I opened a complaint recently and got told I would receive a reply within 24 hours ...... guess what it‚Äôs nearly a week and nothing. Save you you money and train at one of the others as learn direct can not deliver.

headline: signed for the Housing course

headline: Just okay.
reviewBody: Enrolled in an Access to Higher Education course in April 2020, but had to come off furlough so not yet completed (I have until 2024). Time scales are realistic, even with a full time job. Course material is brief, often contains spelling errors, outdated information, and broken web links. The course itself relies on alot of independent learning, which considering the price (even at 45% off) is a bit rubbish. Assignment questions are awkwardly phrased which makes achieving marks unnecessarily difficult. Takes about 5-7 days for a reply to messages and for assignment feedback.

He had the opportunity to invest some time here by offering other courses, help in decision making etc which would have built some trust but instead he amplified my fear that‚Äôs it‚Äôs all about the hard sell of a course and not about the people and making sure they make the right course choice. headline: Learn Direct are Scammers !!!
reviewBody: I would give them no stars if I could!! I signed up for a course which then turned out to be a completely different one that I wanted, I cancelled the course immediately (have proof), I didn't sign the payment agreement (have proof), I didn't access the course materials either. I have had numerous calls from Learn Direct spanning over a year now hounding me for payment for a course I didn't sign up.  Every time I have spoken to then promise to resolve them matter and call me back.  Then weeks pass with me chasing them but they never ever respond or attempt to get back in touch. Then as time goes I get a call from their offices telling me I owe money for the course and then cycle begins again despite the two main people who know about the matter are still at the organisation but choose not to respond. I have been told that my details will be sent to debt collectors if I don't pay up. They say they have a signature and I have asked for this document, not received, as it is clearly fraud as I never signed an agreement.  I now need to find the proper channels to take the matter further.   They are not going to threaten me into giving them money!!! I will never recommend this company as they are scammers...Please do not use them!

headline: So far.....so disappointed
reviewBody:
Update number 2.....the integrity of my review has been questioned. No doubt due to the fact that I haven't changed it to 5 stars! Learn direct don't feel that it is genuine so I have had to prove my enrolment in order to keep this review live. In other words...they don't want any lower reviews against their business name üôà

Just to clarify. My initial review was 1 star, I upgraded to 3 stars after a fantastic response from James. James's response warrants 5 stars but my initial experience was 1 star hence my mid rating now. As my experience with the company continues I may upgrade it further but I won't be pushed into a high review at this point!

I'm not willing to change to a higher rating at this point as I only enrolled on 21st Jan and my experience is both good and bad at the minute. James's help was fantastic but he is one individual who's job is to improve reviews I think! 

Update! 

So after posting my review late Saturday evening, I received a phone call at 9am on Sunday morning! It was instantly sorted and I was switched to the correct course by a very helpful person called James. Amazing service! 

Now in my eyes this doesn't excuse the appalling service from the previous week but credit where it's due to James. He was polite, helpful and got the job done without delay.

One thing to note Learndirect....it shouldn't take a bad review to get customer support sorted out! That said, I'm grateful to now be able to continue with my course. 

So far.....so disappointed. 

I enrolled over the phone on 21/01/21. I was offered a brilliant discount and after clarifying that this was the course I wanted, I signed up. I got immediate access to the content and was very impressed with how easy it was to get online and start studying. 

I realised 2 days later that I had been enrolled on the wrong course so I phoned straight away and spoke to someone who couldn't help and advised me to call back after 10am the next day (Sunday) so I did. I then spoke to a lady who seemed very helpful, she said her manager would need to listen to the call recording so I could expect a call back the next day....it wasn't forthcoming.

I had wanted the Access to HE Medicine and Healthcare Professionals but was enrolled on Access to HE Health Professionals instead. 

So since then I have made 4 more calls. I am still on the wrong course and still have had no call back from a manager. 

Perhaps complaining on a public forum will get me somewhere?

headline: Read before you agree to anything
reviewBody: My wife signed up for a course, tried to cancel before it started, had not had any materials, not accessed or spoken to anyone, and is being hounded for payment. Now threatened with debt collectors! I paid ¬£10 which they demanded from her to stop any action - from my credit card which she made clear, I was in the room, my husband will pay it to stop any action. They are now debiting the course fees to my credit card! I have no agreement or obligation to Learn Direct, or given any authority for them to use it. See you in Court guys !

headline: STEER WELL CLEAR THREATING & WILL TAKE MONEY EVEN IF TOLD THEY ARE UNAUTHORIZED
reviewBody: Absolutely insensitive,rude and money grabbing, I started the course had lots of problems never was able to submit anything could access the assignments by the time this was established ut was outside of the period if time before this nobody contacted me to help me but as soon as my payment failed as I decided to discontinue with the course for a variation of reasons THEN and ONLY THEN did I get a call to ask for money and I got accused of lying about being able to access the course and I even told them there and then I was canceling the course as I didn't want to pay fir something I was unable to continue with the help promised but not given and even though I explained my other reason was my financial status had changed and I couldn't afford it the refused to stop taking money from my account it has left me with excessive bank charges because they keep reinstating the direct debit without my consent even though ive canceled it with my bank but the bank cannot stop them as its a mandate there end and they continue to do so my bank instructed me to cancel there end but despite doing so they gave been deeply insensitive rude and above all now im in hospital ive just had major life-threatening surgery and they are trying to call, text and email continuously telling me they are escalating this further to collections, above and beyond all I would say steer well clear unless you want harassment and bank charges

headline: I found the process of signing up‚Ä¶

headline: Great support and communication
reviewBody: To start with I felt a little pressured into doing the course. A lot of phone calls and communication. After getting a great deal for the course I wanted, I paid the deposit and everything was ok. After a little time I decided to cancel. They offered me a more affordable price but with the current situation I had to decline. It can take up to 30 day to get your refund. But after speaking with a James, he quickly turned this around for me and will be issuing me my deposit back today. The communication and support is brilliant. Very helpful and understanding. Thank you to James C.

headline: The CBT course was very informative and‚Ä¶
reviewBody: The CBT course was very informative and will assist me in my clinical practice in the future. The distance learning methodology is flexible and enable the hours spent to be designed to match a busy lifestyle.  I would recommend this as a first step introductory course to practising CBT. Shame it isn‚Äôt BABCP registered but that will be my next step.

headline: Applied for a business admin course‚Ä¶
reviewBody:
Applied for a business admin course after speaking to a sales agent, had next to no support once I began the course. What I was sold was the opposite of what I received and after logging a complaint an Operations Manager contracted me via email then seems to have dropped off the face of the earth with no aspect of finishing or processing my complaint. An unprofessional company is the simplest way to describe learn direct.
Neither my concerns or this review were looked into or resolved, despite the almost immediate response after uploading the review.

headline: I had been looking at starting a new‚Ä¶
reviewBody:
I had been looking at starting a new course for this year, I looked through many online. Learn direct website is clear and concise.
I requested a call back for the following day and a representative called at allocated time. Explained the course I was interested in starting.
I paid my deposit which is very affordable .
My course work and log in was sent while I was still on the call.
And the representative checked that I had received all that I needed for the course.
The following day ,I had a follow up call by another representative to check that I understood my course modules, he said that he would make a follow up call in a couple of weeks.
I am very happy that I decided to do this course with Learn Direct.

headline: I was not expecting to find my course‚Ä¶
reviewBody:
I was not expecting to find my course being offered by LearnDirect but was very pleasantly surprised to see that it was.

The course is excellent value for money and was even offered with a discount! I used LearnDirect back in the early 2000s and I have been a fan ever since. I'm impressed to see how far it has developed since then particularly in the range of courses now on offer. I'd highly recommend them and it's a great way to develop your knowledge and skills, particularly during the current lockdown restrictions.

headline: Don't bother, save your money
reviewBody: Don't bother. I've spent ¬£800 on a course that I completed in June 2020 and I am still waiting for a certificate because of 'COVID'. Once Learn Direct had my direct debit set up thats where the communication from them ended. I got my packs from third party Stonebridge College. The booklets had spelling errors and communication about submitting assignments was poor. Don't even get me started on the online portal that never worked. Customer service during the last year has been terrible and while I appreciate the COVID situation, there is absolutely no need to be rude to customers. I do hope the calls were recorded and that they think about retraining their staff. I won't bother using them again for home learning. Save your money and go elsewhere.

headline: Absolute shocking customer service
reviewBody:
Absolute shocking customer service. If you raise concerns they are brushed off. I‚Äôve been trying to organise the practical session of my course and was told that they don‚Äôt have enough tutors and are trying to recruit so the next available training date is 12 months after I signed up for the course. My original course date should have been moved, but nobody contacted me. After numerous emails someone called me and my name wasn‚Äôt even in the list. I‚Äôm still paying the monthly payment with absolutely no idea when I will actually be able to start recouping my costs. I would like to clarify that Stonebridge were lovely and reassuring but lease do not book this course through Learn Direct. One you have enrolled they are rude, dismissive and only interested in getting paid without offering any level of service.
Having read the review please be aware that this is nothing to do with covid. I‚Äôm more than understanding of the current situation but please don‚Äôt use it as an excuse for leaving me off the list to rearrange the date and not having any dates because of lack of tutors which I was told by the college. You then completely lied in your response saying that you had enough tutors. So who‚Äôs lying????? I just wanted a date and if I‚Äôd had a date then it was cancelled because of covid I would be fine. This poor service is nothing to do with the current pandemic it‚Äôs your poor service

headline: I am so disappointed
reviewBody: I am so disappointed. I started my course back in September (it is now December) and I wish that I had never started. It is important to me (for logistic reasons) that I finish in July and I am happy to put in the time needed to do this and much more. However it does not matter how much time I put into the course if I have to be psychic to know what is going to pass! The website and the telephone sales person say that: ‚Äúdedicated‚Äù,‚Äúyour very own personal tutor‚Äú, ‚ÄúYou can contact them via email or phone‚Äù (learndirect.com, how-it-works page, 30/12/2020). This is not true; dedicated = you have a person who has a day job and will look at your work late at night, possibly exhausted, for pocket money. Your very own personal tutor = a different tutor for every assessment, no continuity. You can contact them by phone = oh no you can not! and if you try to then the customer service staff are rude and unhelpful. Your contact with the tutors will be via the messaging service, which is a bad version of email and does not always work, there were weeks when I could not access any messages at all. If you can see your messages you will find that the ‚Äòtutors‚Äô have 3 days in which to reply to you, and some of them make you wait the full three days! This makes ‚Äútalking‚Äù to your tutor a painful and unproductive experience (and yes they use the word ‚Äútalk‚Äù in the website and when they are tele-selling to you, even though you are never allowed to actually talk to them, only write). The cryptic feedback has left me shaking my head in complete bemusement about what on earth they are looking for in an assessment. The crushing word limits on the assignments leave you unable to cover a subject fully and show that you know your stuff, and leave you having to guess what the specific handful of words they are looking for are! I dispute the term ‚Äòtutor‚Äô as this implies ‚Äúa private teacher, typically one who teaches a single pupil or a very small group‚Äù (Google dictionary 30/12/2020) as you get no such person; What  you get is an assessor who gives you cryptic messages, they do not teach you anything at all. Lastly, the peer support is almost entirely composed of people asking to join external whatsapp groups, there is almost no peer support within the course.

headline: WORSE COMPANY FOR LEARNERS
reviewBody:
WORSE COMPANY FOR LEARNERS. 
Honestly i would not normally go to my keyboard to write a review, but ¬£3,000 down after the diabolical decision to study an access degree, i felt the need to warn others. 
The UCAS application needed for universities took over 6 weeks, and therefore missed the deadline. 
The company's support for your work is absolutely devastating... they would not even give corrections on work after unit 10 therefore the first draft of work they saw was your grade, never mind the fact you are NOT ALLOWED to work on it again to try and improve it. 
Please if looking for a study course... DO NOT USE LEARNDIRECT!!

headline: Beware
reviewBody:
Signed up for a Nail Tech course and paid in full back in May 2020. Was told kit would be on its way. No kit. Called in July 2020 and again in August 2020, again no response regardless of leaving countless messages.

Finally got through to someone named Zoe (in October) who treated me terribly, spoke to me in an extremely disrespectful and condescending manner. Emailed to complain and request refund- still no response.

They are in breach of their own T&Cs. Technically stealing money and not providing a service.

Their T&C state:
In accordance with The Consumer Contracts (Information, Cancellation and Additional Charges) Regulations 2013, which replaced the Consumer Protection (Distance Selling) Regulations 2000, you may cancel your course anytime within fourteen days after you receive your course materials whether in hard copy or online.

I have still not received physical course materials as advertised.

These people are cheats and liars and have no shame in taking peoples money without fulfilling their obligations as a service provider

headline: Told I can‚Äôt cancel within 14 days!
reviewBody:
I signed up to start an access to higher education (midwifery) course. I decided to contact customer services within the given 14 working days to cancel my contract, but was told I‚Äôm unable to even though on the day of contact it was 10 working days. Since then I have contacted the customer service team several times by letter, email and phone to try and rectify this, sometimes not even getting a response. I‚Äôm now paying ¬£1,754 for the full course even though I was within my rights to cancel. I don‚Äôt mind paying for the bit I accessed before I tried to cancel but when I contact customer services they‚Äôve said all I can do is do another course of the same value or higher. Customer service were very rude and unprofessional on the phone, I have been shouted at saying I can‚Äôt have a refund. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this company.

EDIT UPDATE: I was contacted by James within the hour of putting my review up. He got back in touch today and should be cancelling my contract and refunding part of my payments within a few days.
Will update when payment is done!
Thanks for your help James

headline: Signed up with Learn Direct a couple of‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Signed up with Learn Direct a couple of weeks ago to do a short Criminology Course. The sign up was easy and within minutes, I had access to my course. The course materials are interesting and in simple terms that are easy to understand, and the assignments arent to taxing either. All in all, a great experience.

headline: Cancelled my course under the cooling‚Ä¶
reviewBody:
Cancelled my course under the cooling off period and was told I would be refunded the ¬£1400 within 30 days. It‚Äôs been 30 days and no refund has been received: so they in fact breach there own terms and conditions: I cancelled due to my father been diagnosed with cancer. I‚Äôm absolutely appalled at this sort of treatment and find it far fetched that 30 days isn‚Äôt long enough even during a pandemic to process a simple refund: I was told that I didn‚Äôt need to do anything else after filling out the form and that all would be taken care of: I will now be seeking damages and legal advice for them breaching their terms of sale contract. 
This money could have been used to make my dads possibly last Christmas a really lovely time, instead learn direct have added more stress and time I need to plough into sorting incompetence like this. 
Avoid them at all costs rip off con artists

Edit update - contacted support and they say they are processing today and should be refunded in 5/7 days: will update on progress at that point if refund received

edit update 2 - refund finally landed in my account on day 32 of waiting. I was contacted shortly after this asking to remove my feedback which i'm hesitant to do since this has been a true reflection of my experience with them,i have amended my experience rating but will be leaving the rest

headline: Illegal to not let me cancel within 14 day period
reviewBody: I asked how submission worked and instead of just explaining, someone in customer service submitted my unfinished work for me. This was in the 14 day period in which you can cancel a contract with them so I requested they cancel my contract. They refused on the basis that their terms and conditions state that if you have started downloading the content you cannot cancel. This was illegal and against Consumer rights legislation which states that if your course starts within the 14-day period you still have the right to cancel, but you must pay for the value of the service that was provided to you up to the point you cancel. After posting this review, James, one of the customer service agents, contacted me and arranged for the contract to be cancelled. I am very grateful for his assistance.

headline: Initially impressed but it quickly became a rip off
reviewBody:
Initially I was impressed but by the time I got to the 4 module, the assessment questions were asking things that were not covered in the course material. I tried to make a complaint but its been more than 10 days and I've had no answer at all. I had to rely on google to pass and judging by the results I found, so have several other people going back at least 8 years. The assessment questions didn't even make sense. I believe this is done so you cannot ask for a refund as you have started the course. NO WAY was my course worth ¬£370+. They recommended a book (which probably has more information in it than the course material did) that you can only buy on amazon and costs ¬£30+. My course also came with a kit but they couldn't tell me when I would get it, only that I would. 
I feel completely ripped off now. I wish I'd gone elsewhere. It's so bad that I ended up having to take another course with a different company because even though I passed with learn direct, I had to use google and I don't feel like I learnt anything. AVOID & SAVE YOUR MONEY!

The lady on the other end of the phone started to 'Huff' she then told me to 'get someone round to help'. I told her I live alone and we are in the middle of a pandemic, I also have multiple sclerosis. She then sent me the link to cancel when I asked for it. I managed to eventually log in to find I had to take a test. This has totally put me off and I am going ahead with the cancellation .

I'm just gutted I didn't go for learn direct previously in the first place. Thank you again.

headline: Enrolment was fantastic, tutor support less so.
reviewBody:
Enrolment was fantastic. Laura answered my questions efficiently and credibly. However I have been studying for 3 weeks and it isn't quite the experience it was sold on. I have studied 4 units and I am on my 5th, however only 1 has been marked and you can't submit any work until the previous is achieved. This isn't a huge issue however I need to work through this course in a relatively short time due to intending to start Uni in September. I haven't had a call from my tutor which in a learning role I would expect to have an initial introduction call to understand my goals and aspirations in order for the tutor to help me achieve them. I find it ironic that one of my Units is all about learning theories where i have to understand my own, yet the tutors have no intention of helping us work to this. This isn't a negative against the tutors as it is the system and SLAs that have been set up.I don't expect hand holding as it is an online course but I would expect an initial relationship building call to cover initial questions and learn how each other prefer to work which is critical in learning and business. I also require a certain number of D/M/P to get on my call so I would have liked to have discussed with my tutor and had her give suggestions on best practise in order to obtain as many distinctions as possible.

The online support team are fantastic, a lady called Emma has helped very efficiently however I was told the tutors often come back the same day but this certainly isn't the case. I am currently working on an assignment planner where we have to stipulate timescales for each step and the one thing holding me off hitting each step is the time it takes to get a reply on a simple clarification. I find this frustrating as I have planned sufficient time to study yet can't always move past a specific question. I chose learndirect even though it was a bit more expensive as I expected a higher level of service. 
Another gripe is the learning materials are obviously online but I prefer to have somethings on paper and the materials aren't print friendly so you have to copy and paste as printing directly doesn't format them. It's a shame you can't purchase a booklet for those of us who like to make notes on our handouts.
if your self motivated and able to study alone, the quality of the learning materials are great but if you struggle to motivate yourself, this might not be the course for you. 
The messaging system isn't very effective, it would be great to have a level 1 support team via IM who could provide the answers to more simply questions, referring the more detailed subject questions to tutors.

headline: Cancellation Process
reviewBody:
With heavy heart I had to cancel today, as the Lock Down puts us financially in a difficult position. 
It was very easy to cancel within the 14 days cancellation policy. I first emailed the Customer Service, and Rianna, that both told me to call the Customer Service on Monday. I called today, Wednesday and got a form to fill out. They offered me a break of payments so I could still do it and then pay later, or a reduction of course costs, which I appreciated so very much, and I am so glad that I have met understanding and help. 
Unfortunately I couldn't take the offers, as financially we are just very anxious for the moment, as the future is very uncertain. 
But I will definitel come back again, and would recommend it to everyone. They're amazing.

headline: Course just okay; fairly bad experience with customer service
reviewBody:
Overall, I found elements of the course interesting and useful (the materials for the course do need updating, however, and I found myself having to read significantly around the subject area to make my answers to certain questions relevant). 

My experience with customer service was moderate. Some representatives were proactive, others not so.

I received my certificate (and cashback) a fair few months after completing the course, but you do have to pester customer services for this. They won't update you otherwise.

I was asked back around the time of completing the course whether I would be happy to take part in a 'case study', which required me to write answers to a number of questions. I was promised a payment for this; however, it was never paid and subsequent e-mails regarding payment were ignored. Beware of completing such case studies.

Update: despite a 'rapid' response to this review from Learndirect, and the matter taken up and apparently resolved by issuing a cheque, I never received it (nor was there any follow up e-mail stating it had been issued). This has been a long-running theme with Learndirect, where documents or cheques are apparently issued, or popped in the post, but never received. 

I'm not sure what is going on with Learndirect, but it's certainly been a pretty disappointing experience all round.

headline: Shockingly poor management
reviewBody: I signed up to the complete nail course. Paid half of the course so I could receive the included kit. First time I called to chase this I was told they were waiting on the practice hand. Second time I was told they are waiting on the acrylic system. It kept changing each time. Today after starting the course in July I was told they don‚Äôt have the kit in stock still and also asked me what I had already received! And would contact dispatching team and get back to me. It‚Äôs been 5 weeks since they said I was at the top of the list. I won‚Äôt be doing another course through learn direct as this is seriously poor management. The theory side of things has been great the tutor gives solid information when marking work and promptly.

headline: Sport Science 2nd review (mid course)
reviewBody:
Well, I am halfway through my sports science course now and I am really impressed with the coursework and information provided. 
A few years ago I took a level 3 personal training course with another provider and I stopped at level 2 due to the hidden costs involved and amount of travelling that was required to the testing venues. So when I enrolled with learndirect it was great to sign up and there were no extra costs involved and the ability to study from home. I assign a full day a week to go through each module and then I complete the assignment at the end for each module. The quality and information provided in the modules were much better than the personal training course I was on with another provider before. 
I will post a final review at the end of the course. So far, from enrolling and now I'm halfway through I can't recommend them enough. I will definitely be taking further courses with them.

headline: Misled on practical kit included in course price
reviewBody:
After researching online I opted to do the Complete Nail Tech course with Learn Direct as they include the equipment you need to get started. This would be easier than sourcing everything myself. When booking the course I was told it would be sent shortly after I made full payment for the course, or after I had made half the instalments if I spread it out. I opted to pay in full and get the kit quicker. I have now been told, after chasing several times and completing all my theory work, that the kits aren‚Äôt in stock and they don‚Äôt know when they‚Äôll be available. I would have been better off using a different provider and sourcing my own kit. I feel I was misled at booking, and when I first chased the kit as I wasn‚Äôt told the truth. I have gone to a different provider for the subsequent courses I have wanted to do. The theory materials were good, and exams marked quickly with clear feedback.

Edit: the message responding to me from Learn Direct claiming kit was dispatched following this review should be ignored. Nothing has been dispatched to me. I have removed a star from my original review. I have contacted their customer service team again and have been told there is no one there who can assist me so I have to call back Monday.

Final edit: I have finally received my kit thanks to Sue. The review will remain at two stars as there is a poor level of communication within the company. I am now, however, able to complete my assignments

headline: Terrible customer service.
reviewBody:
I purchased a course with Learndirect. When i purchased there was no explanation that the exams weren't included- just a polite reference would've helped me consider. 
So after months of study i ask if i can complete the exams. It took weeks for someone to come back to me to tell me there's a large additional cost. 
The person i spoke to also said i should be entitled to a discount as i'd already paid for the courses. 
I contacted and proceeded to contact this company on more than 10 occasions to request booking and arranging my exams. 
After waiting again on the phone for over 20 minutes to get through a few days ago, i was reassured that i'd get a call back.... nothing! 
I am frustrated and irritated by the lack of communication. 
I would do you research more and not go with this company... turns out the course i paid hundreds for is actually available FREE via other companies.

headline: Paying for an outdated course!!!
reviewBody:
Not happy at all!
Enrolled in a course that was outdated (last version from 2015) and didn't get a refund!
Would obviously not recommend.


21-November-2020
After having to proof my relationship with learn direct(learndirect  reported your review because they don't believe you've had a genuine buying or service experience. Reported reviews are temporarily moved offline.)they agreed to pay me a refund. Here is a copy of the email:

I can confirm that we have received your request to cancel your course, and thus your course cancellation has been approved. We are terribly sorry to hear that you have decided not to study with us and hope that you will consider doing so in the future.

Once again, we are sorry to hear that you no longer wish to study with us, and you will receive the appropriate refund your fees within the next 30 days.

Kind regards,

Alison Jones

Head of Cancellations and conversions.

Well,again they have failed to do what they promised.

From my experience I just can advise you to think twice before buying any service,and if you do,please make sure you check everything asap.If you wish to cancel and you call them someone will say that they will do it for you, which didn't happened in my case,and your cancellation period will expire.Make sure you email them as well!!! Writing a review helps a lot! That's the only way they contact you straight away!!

headline: I completed my course back in February‚Ä¶
reviewBody:
I completed my course back in February 2020. And still have not received any form of certification 7 months after completion.  I have contacted my tutor and have had no response.  I feel that I have paid for nothing to be honest.  Because I paid for the course. I put in the hard work to complete the course whilst working 60+ hours per week, and for what.  
I feel very disappointed. I did my course to better my options professionally.  Seems I wasted my time. And money.

Learn direct asked me for my contact details following this post so they could contact me regarding my certification. 
I forwarded my contact details for this to happen.  And guess what.  Still NO response whatsoever ever.  
What a complete waste of a year of studies and money.


Update. 
Today is now 14/10/2020
Following a request from this company for my contact details for them to contact me. I sent them my contact details in order to resolve this issue. 
I am very disappointed to say. There has been no contact made from this company to date.

headline: Please do NOT use these people !
reviewBody:
EDIT -  reply to the response!  Can I just say you did not phone 3 times to ask about my kit I have saved all 3 messages which are about this review.  I will be writing a complaint and going back to citizens advice.  please stay away from this company I definitely won‚Äôt be using them again or recommending them to friends and family. 

EDIT -  I have now received my kit which I‚Äôm very grateful for however today whilst I‚Äôve been celebrating my husbands birthday I‚Äôve received 1 email and three voicemails from them asking me to remove this review as I have now received my kit, basically harassing me as it looks bad for them!!!!!! 


Please do NOT use these people !! Excuse after excuse! Constantly blaming the pandemic.  I totally get it‚Äôs been hard but if you can‚Äôt do what your meant to do why still open ?  You‚Äôve taken my money and yet I can‚Äôt finish my course due to no kit.  I‚Äôve phoned and got told it be a week and I will receive it 3 weeks on nothing I have emailed 6 times to finally get a respond saying your having trouble with the kits but can‚Äôt give an exact date !! But quiet happy to have people‚Äôs money in your pocket and get told lies after lies !! 
I have contacted citizens advice and they advise I put in a complaint and go further if nothing gets done !! This isn‚Äôt the last of me !!! 
SCAMMERS please don‚Äôt waste your money on this company !!!

headline: Dishonest reply from Learndirect
reviewBody:
I posted a negative review 5 days ago "They don't honour their Terms & Conditions".

Learndirect replied to my review with a blatant lie by saying:

"Our cancellation procedure is detailed within our Terms and Conditions and we are very strict on this being followed accordingly."

Their T&Cs regarding Cancellations, which can be found online on their website, state:

"To cancel your course you must contact the customer service team 01202 006346 within office hours Monday -Friday 9am-5pm. Please note cancellations cannot be accepted via email or postal format."

As instructed by their T&Cs I called them on Friday 11 September (same day I signed up for the course) to cancel my course purchase, but they refused to do so. Their representative said I would receive a link to a form   for me to fill in on Monday.

On Saturday I received a call from someone at Learndirect asking me how I was getting on with the course. I explained that I had requested a cancellation the day before, but the representative told me she was not aware of a cancellation request from me.

I then called Learndirect again on Monday and they finally emailed me the link to the cancellation form WHICH IS NOT PART OF their cancellation procedure stated in their T&Cs. Their representative on the phone threatened to ignore my cancellation request if I didn't fill in the form and submitted it back to them for review even though I argued that I didn't have to do that as it is not stated in their T&Cs.

I'd also like to point out that when I first signed up for the course on the phone, I asked their sales  representative if they could provide me with a course sample for me to try before buying, but he said that I would have 14 days to try the course after paying for it, and that all I had to do to cancel was to call their cancellation team. He didn't tell me that I would have to call them twice, wait for a link to a form, fill in the form, submit it back to them, and wait for them to review and approve my request.

It has been more than 7 days since I first called to request cancellation and refund, but I still have not received my refund.

headline: AVOID AT ALL COST...
reviewBody: Wow, after reading all this negative comments and after my awful experience I have to edit mine now. Purchased a nearly ¬£600 course!! through their website in September and as I experienced troubles with it due Covid-19 pandemic among other things decided to cancel it. Called customer care within the 14 days cooling off period to cancel my course but no chance to get through. So I did through email. Then, called again to confirm cancellation and very rudely they said not to and I could only possibly change the course or pay it in full!! Customer care is awful and disgraceful. I have been monthly paying a lot money for nothing until now. Do not waste your time and money. Should have gone for a different provider. These people are restricting people rights on purpose to get their money. Paid nearly ¬£260 for nothing. They don't care about customers or students they are only after your money!! Honestly, a rip off Unethical firm..

headline: Nail tech course
reviewBody: I am doing the nail tech course and I understand there has been supplier issues. I called up to pay half the course in order for the kit to be sent out - it is at that point somebody should have advised there were issues and I wouldn‚Äôt get the kit quickly instead the money was taken and they said they would send it out. I called up and chased and was told there were issues and it would be sent out the following week. I called up again and was advised there were supplier issues and it will be sent out shortly they‚Äôre working through the backlog. I called up yet again and have now been told they don‚Äôt even know when the supplier will be sending in kits again and everything is on hold with no time frame at all. Not happy. I could have kept the extra money and paid it off in monthly instalments and by the time the kits actually ready I probably would have paid enough.

headline: TOTALLY SHOCKING
reviewBody:
If there was the option to give Zero stars that‚Äôs what I would have selected. 
So I paid in full for my course that was booked in November 2019. I completed the course in February and passed successfully. 
I haven‚Äôt received my pass certifications and badges despite chasing them up on endless occasions. I emailed, left voicemails, sent texts, called and called and hung on in queues, booked callback appts which never happened. Even emailed their CEO but that has also gone unacknowledged. 
Unfortunately for me no accreditation then no income. 
Shame on you LD and Stonebridge College.
Never again will I book a course through you or indeed recommend anyone else to do so. 
They take your money and then discard their commitment to you.

headline: Beware great at selling, really bad if you try and cancel
reviewBody:
Not once was i told it would take a week to cancel and that it would take 30 days to even process this refund. When I signed up they told me 14 timescale to decide and you will receive a refund for your course fees of you cancel within this time frame. I cancelled within 7 days as I have started a new job and want to wait a year.
The agent told me that I am lucky as I done this within the 8 days ... beware wow again miss leading information. Also when signing up to the course I was rushed and told in a hurry I have one day left for the 9.99 sign up discount. I checked two Days later and this sign up fee was the same again why the rush and why lie to me. I won‚Äôt be going via learn direct in a years time .. please be wary when you sign up and change your mind. Don‚Äôt let them rush your choice. 
Big warning ‚ö†Ô∏è

Reply to learn direct .. sorry I don‚Äôt take that offers change daily .. that‚Äôs a selling tactic. The agent on the phone told me it‚Äôs the last day ... and it never changed the next day... really Care to explain.
This is suppose to be supported learning not a selling drive.

Also where is my refund it‚Äôs been 30 days ....?

headline: Learndirect owe me ¬£740, where is it?
reviewBody: Unfortunately my experience with Learndirect  wasn‚Äôt great. Although the course content was great I soon found that online learning wasn‚Äôt for me. I called Learndirect and they were happy to give me a full refund as I was within my 14 day bracket. I was told that I would receive my full refund within 30 days. It‚Äôs been other 30 days and I still haven‚Äôt received my refund. I‚Äôve been advised by the Learndirect customer service team that they will contact the ‚Äòaccounts team‚Äô and they‚Äôve told me this 3 times!! I spoke to Zoe today and she was very rude and said she can‚Äôt do anything! Also their complaints number doesn‚Äôt work! They owe me over ¬£740! They easily took the money but can‚Äôt return it? Please be aware when buying any courses from them !!!
